title: S17 Ep104: Supernatural News/Parashare: Having a Cryptid Cookout w/Beer City Bruiser
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Having a Cryptid Cookout w/Beer City Bruiser
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Having a Cryptid Cookout with Beer City Bruiser!!

Now, we don't mean we are literally mean we are cooking the creatures! But we are approaching the Labor Day Weekend, and a Cryptid gotta get it's crunk on and of course, we are gonna report on it! Cruiser and Bruiser grab their Coozies and Floaties and head down to the beach to see what all the hubbub is with our paranormal pals and gather the stories just for you! 

This week,  Bigfoot is spotted at the beach! REALLY! The People of Loch Ness set up more cameras around the Loch to catch a glimpse of Nessie. The Puca surprises a Paranormal Investigation team in Ireland, and Sammy Hagar claims that Eddie Van Halen visited him in a dream and helped him write a song! 

Check out our new site, https://www.darknessradioshow.com/ to find all of our old archives, leave us a voice message for parashare, read our blogs, and much more!

Find out where Beer City Bruiser is holding his breath and needlepointing near you: https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester
